=== Ubuntu Community Contribution ===

My aim is to help get Ubuntu to work great on as many different makes and models of <nowiki>[[https://wiki.ubuntu.com/Testing/Laptop|laptops]]</nowiki> as possible. I can test Ubuntu on the following laptops:

* HP Mini 5102
* HP Compaq nx6125
* Toshiba Satellite L300-1AP

=== About Me ===

My name is Martin Webster and I am Systems Support Manager at <nowiki>[[http://www.leics.gov.uk/|Leicestershire County Council]]</nowiki>. I run the applications support teams that manage the corporate information systems.

My professional interests include project and programme management, business administration, and Strategic Information Systems Planning (SISP.) Iâ€™m a chartered member of the <nowiki>[[http://www.bcs.org/|British Computer Society]]</nowiki> and a registered mentor with the <nowiki>[[http://www.theiet.org/|Institution of Engineering and Technology]]</nowiki>.

I spend my leisure time learning, collecting and listening to music, and being the proud parent of teenage twins. Other interests include watercolour and acrylic painting. I have a 2-year old Golden Retriever.
